attributes.action: People of the Unitedkingdom to STOP paying for gas and eletric
attributes.additional_details: The prices of eletric and gas are astonishingly high some people don’t even get wages per month as high, this needs to stop ASAP and the goverment need to put a stop to this before the U.K. gets into a hole they can’t get out of
attributes.background: Eletric and gas prices are at a unprecedented high, this needs to stop ASAP! Action must be taken !

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The energy cap is set by Ofgem, which is operationally independent of the Government and Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Nationalise Energy Companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608056
